dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3504 IH: Artemis Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Ansari (for herself, Ms. Velázquez, and Mr. Carson) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend section 235 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for an exception from expedited removal for certain countries concern.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Artemis Act of 2025.

section.header: Exception from expedited removal for certain countries of particular concern or special watch list countries
section.text: Section 235(b)(1) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1225(b)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking subparagraph (F) each place it appears and inserting subparagraph (F) or (H); and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Subparagraph (A) shall not apply to an alien who is a native or citizen of a country of concern or would be removed to such a country. For the purposes of this subparagraph, the term country of concern means a country designated by the Secretary of State to be a country of particular concern or is a special watch list country under section 402(b)(1)(A) International Religious Freedom Act of 1998.
